options.content:
graph  LR  
  subgraph  h1  ["NODENAMEA"]
  ip{{VLAN: VLANA  -  IP: DATAPLANEIPA}}
  e(IFNAMEHOSTA)
  end
  
  e(IFNAMEHOSTA)  ----  sw1s1if[NAMEIFAIN]

  subgraph  sw1  ["SNMPANAME Switch"]
  subgraph  sw1s1  ["port"]
  sw1s1vlan{{VLAN:  SWITCHAINVLAN}}
  sw1s1if[NAMEIFAIN]
  end
  subgraph  sw1s2  ["port"]
  sw1s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHAOUTVLAN}}
  sw1s2ifout[NAMEIFAOUT]
  end
  end

  subgraph  sw2  ["SNMPBNAME Switch"]
  subgraph  sw2s1  ["port"]
  sw2s1vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHBINVLAN}}
  sw2s1if[NAMEIFBIN]
  end
  subgraph  sw2s2  ["port"]
  sw2s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCHBOUTVLAN}}
  sw2s2ifout[NAMEIFBOUT]
  end
  end
  
  sw1s2ifout[NAMEIFAOUT]  ----  sw2s1if[NAMEIFBIN]
  sw2s2ifout[NAMEIFBOUT]  ----  e2(IFNAMEHOSTB)
  
  subgraph  h2  ["NODENAMEB"]
  ip2{{VLAN: VLANB  -  IP: DATAPLANEIPB}}  
  e2(IFNAMEHOSTB)
  end

```
node name: NODENAMEA   interface name: IFNAMEHOSTA   interface IP: DATAPLANEIPA   node IP: IPHOSTA
 ```

```
Switch: SNMPANAME   port 1: SWITCHAINCOMING   port 2: SWITCHAOUTGOING   switch IP: IPSWITCHA
```
